Just Another Optimistic Soul

March 31, 2012 . Random .

Topic buzz

What others are thinking. Add to the conversation and generate some chatter.

Tweet


Read later

Save this blog post for a later read or point of reference.

Think Positive..

My day-to-day approach to life and the unpredictablity it brings has recently been summarized in 'Twitter format' aka 150 characters. "Your negative thoughts can hold you captive. Positive Thinking and letting go of the past can open your eyes to a whole new world"


The influence of my blog post title comes from one of my favorite Reggae and all around artists... Buju Banton. More specifically, his recent hit single Optimistic Soul before his subsequent incareration.

Check out the video for Optimistic Soul below

Optimism will be the general theme of this blog. Taking each opportunity to develop and display my skills and ideas.


However, That's all for now, Nowhere to go but up from here, but in the meanwhile...

Free Buju!
